title: WHY RIOT WHY?
body:
WHY RIOT WHY?

All of the times i have been trying to get it back they have refused to help me or anything of this.
I have provided with loads of proofs and they still cant help me.

Please pm me if you are interessted of helping me to get my league account back btw:
Its my main account that i lost
Just saying its on lvl 1 but i spent time and loads of money on this account and on the lolking etc it saying its lvl 30 and on euw :/
Please riot i really wanna talk of your 
SUPERVISOR OVER PHONE!

Thanks!

replies.body: Don't worry, we can help!  While we don't offer phone support, we do have an account recovery team that can assist by filling out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Fill it out, and a specialist will reply back to you as soon as possible.  Hang tight until then!

I HAVE BEEN TYPING TO THEM LIKE 100 TIMES, THEY REFUSE TO HELP ME!
I have provided with all the information i can and they still wont give me my account back.
Says on na and i feel you are just bunch of scammers right now.
Im sorry im mad, i have been playing this game since 2012 and now this account is gone?
What can i do about it?
NOTHING
What can riot do?
Nothing cus they say i never have enough of information.
I have been sending screenshots of the account since years ago and they still wont help me

Ah I see!  It sounds like you've gone through a lot, but our account recovery team will only restore an account only if they are absolutely sure- without a shadow of a doubt- that it's going to the original owner.  Even if you fail to recover, it's okay to try again.  I wish you the best of luck!
